channel.title: Copyright
channel.description:
hi,
I wanted to know if it is or not copyright to copy this page that has been copied in this topic. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html[/url] Does it make a big difference if i stick something like [code]Website Design, Stylesheets & Navigation are Copyright © 1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd.[/code] On to the footer and not. Does this mean that i can use the website template?? I'm confused cuz of the topic..

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Samih1996:

Pffff, i love the design tho… Is there any way i can get premission?

Just go ahead and use it. As said above, they would contact you before they would take any legal procedures. If you aren’t receiving huge amounts of traffic and money from something they created, Jagex has more important things to care about.

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Samih1996:

Pffff, i love the design tho… Is there any way i can get premission?

You will need written consent from Jagex to use it with out getting into trouble, I doubt there going to give it to you because I doubt they would even give a fan site permission…

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Pffff, i love the design tho… Is there any way i can get premission?

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Well it’s likely Jagex aren’t going to care about you quite yet and you most likely won’t get in trouble (they’ll get in contact with you or your host first to ask you/them to remove the offending materials before starting legal proceedings). However, you will be breaking copyright laws by doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Hmm, so i will get in trouble if i put the website on to my server :o

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Samih1996, post:11, topic:384151”]Well, i wasn’t planing to copy their name. My game is called “War of Destiny”, I give rares to players when they donate. I’m not sure if its ok for me to use the site.

The only thing im copying is the style sheets, design and the navigation.[/quote]As well as their game client and all its contents.

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Well, i wasn’t planing to copy their name. My game is called “War of Destiny”, I give rares to players when they donate. I’m not sure if its ok for me to use the site.

The only thing im copying is the style sheets, design and the navigation.

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

It is not worth Jagex’s time and money unless you’re generating money from it or demeaning their or Runescape’s name. You should specify you’re not affiliated with Jagex, Runscape or any of its services otherwise you could get accused of phishing. You can also get in more trouble for claiming something as yours that is proprietary to Jagex.

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Samih1996:

So i will get in shit if i put this on my website?

I doubt it. It’s possible, but unless your server and website are generating enough traffic it’s going to go unnoticed, and hundreds of people probably have that on their website.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

If you use someone’s work without their written permission, it’s copyright infringement. No ways around it. Doesn’t matter what you put in the footer.

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

I’m saying that if i copy the runescape highscores pages and turn it into my homepage with the footer Website Design, Stylesheets & Navigation are Copyright © 1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd. Would it be ok?? Because they have copied it from the highscores to make their own highscores on this link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

It is copyrighted because the images were ripped from their website.

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I don’t think there’s any legal way to copy a website that is protected by copyright laws.

Read full topic
